description:
Bismarck's Leading Full-Service Legal Practice


If you live in western North Dakota and face serious legal challenges that affect your freedom, your livelihood or your business, you can rely on the attorneys at Sand Law for the top-notch legal representation you deserve.

From our law office in Bismarck, North Dakota, our law firm's founding partners, Rick Sand and William Anthony Sand, serve clients throughout Burleigh County and the surrounding areas, and we are fully devoted to delivering the highest level of legal support and advocacy possible to the individuals, families and businesses of our community.

Dedicated To Protecting Your Rights And Interests

Dedicated to protecting the rights and interests of those we serve, we offer effective criminal defense strategies to those facing any type of felony or misdemeanor charges. Handling all types of personal injury and wrongful death claims, we fight hard on behalf of those dealing with serious injuries or losses caused by someone else's negligence or wrongdoing.

Likewise, both entrepreneurs and existing business owners alike can rely on us for assistance with establishing their companies and providing ongoing support and counsel for all business-related matters. Additionally, we will stand by your side during any type of business dispute to help you resolve your conflicts and protect what you've worked so hard to build.

Personalized Support From A Top-Rated Attorney

Highly rated by our clients and peers and winners of numerous awards and honors, the attorneys at Sand Law are fully prepared to assist you with your important and pressing legal issues. To receive the personalized attention you deserve from an attorney you can trust, you can contact our law office to schedule a free initial consultation.
